## Profile details

- **Animal:** (bear / cat / owl / puppy / rabbit / wolf)
- **Profile name:** (e.g., "The Paladin", "The Sensei")
- **Depth:** (flavour / modifier)
- **Theme:** (fantasy / neutral / custom — describe)

## Profile content

Paste your profile below following the [SPEC-CM-006-A](https://github.com/cgbarlow/campaign-mode/blob/main/docs/3_specs/SPEC-CM-006-A-Character-Profile-Format.md) format:

```markdown
---
animal:
profile-name:
depth:
theme:
---

# {Animal} — {Profile Name}

## Character Concept

## Tone and Voice

## Behavioural Modifiers (modifier depth only)
```

## How did you use this profile?

Describe the campaign or context where you created this profile. What worked well? What would you change?
